mapper.insert: insert into short_audio(content, actId, actName, openid, fileName) value (#{audio.content}, #{audio.actId}, #{audio.actName}, #{audio.openid}, #{audio.fileName});
mapper.update: update short_audio set approved = #{approved}, checked = true where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select sa.id, sa.actid, sa.actname, sa.content, sa.openid, sa.filename, sa.approved, sa.checked, sa.uploadTime, sa.thumb, sa.amount, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.qq, u.phoneNum from short_audio sa left join user u on sa.openid = u.openid;

select sa.id, sa.actid, sa.actname, sa.content, sa.openid, sa.filename, sa.uploadTime, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.qq, u.phoneNum from short_audio sa left join user u on sa.openid = u.openid where approved = true;
